title: GIS Software: Libraries - Northwestern University
content: Workstations in libraries are equipped with GIS software. This includes Esri ArcGIS Desktop, Esri ArcPro and Quantum GIS (QGIS). The Esri ArcGIS Desktop applications has additional extensions available which include: 3D Analyst, Geostatistical Analyst, Network Analyst, Spatial Analyst, Tracking Analyst, Publisher and Schematics. We encourage you to reach out to GIS staff (gis@northwestern.edu) to consult on the use of a range of desktop and web based software solutions for making maps, transforming static tables into maps or performing geospatial analysis. Each library desktop has the following installed: Use our Research Guide to learn more about GIS software, data and training. If you have questions please do not hesitate to contact GIS Staff at gis@northwestern.edu.
